intro.p: Converts the Indigo molecules in one of the input table's columns into various string representations (SDF, SMILES, CML).
This node uses Indigo classes to process structures.

fullDescription.option: The column that contains Indigo molecules.
Appends a new column (with the name as specified in the text field) if checked, replaces the original column otherwise.

ports.outPort: Table with the molecules' converted string representations
